property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Action, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your cards would cause a Weapon or Armor to be scrapped from the upgraded character -> Scrap this card instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Trucks only. When the upgraded character does attack damage to an enemy -> Your opponent flips that enemy to it's other mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> Draw 2 cards. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Enemies can't use Brave or Stealth this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> You may play an Armor onto the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play an Action. Then you may play another Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +2 [ATK[ and Pierce 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move up to 5 damage counters from one of your Decepticon leaders that has 8 [STAR] or more to one of your other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Melee characters only. When the upgraded character is defending against a Specialist -> The upgraded character has +1 [DEF].

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> Your opponent can't flip more than 4 battle cards during this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> Each of your characters get +1 [DEF] until end of turn..

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap one of your Upgrades -> Scrap up to 2 enemy Upgrades of the same type as your scrapped Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap an enemy Weapon or Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is scrapped from a character -> Scrap an enemy Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character defends and would take an even amount of attack damage -> Instead it takes no attack damage. When the upgraded chracter defends and takes no attack damage -> Scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on characters that have 11 [STAR] or more. The upgraded character has +4 [HEALTH].

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn -> Do 1 damage to the upgraded character. When the upgraded character is KO'd -> Do 2 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 1. When you put this on a character -> You may play another Extra Padding. Up to 3 Extra Paddings can fit in 1 Armor slot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Firecons only. Each of your Firecons has Bold 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take 5 or more attack damage -> Instead scrap this card and the upgraded character takes 4 attack damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does one damage to it. If your starting team was only Decepticons -> Your opponent does 1 more damage to the chosen character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If the include at least [O][B][W], put them all into your hand. Otherwise scrap them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. You may play a Weapon, an Armor, and a Utility onto it.

property.name: Text
property.value: All characters get Bold 3 and Tough 3 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tap one of your untapped Autobots. Add its [ATK] total to one of your untapped Autobots until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender. When Revealed -> One of your characters gets Stealth until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When your opponent plays an [O] Action. When Revealed -> Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on characters that have 7 [STAR] or fewer. Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Shockwave only. Up to 2 LV Gamma -> Disruptor Launchers can fir in 1 Weapon slot. When you put this on Shockwave -> Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Autobots only. If the upgraded character would take non-attack damage -> Instead it takes that much damages minus one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 2 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Upgrade, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you use the upgraded character's [TAP] ability -> Untap that character and scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 1. When this is scrapped from a character -> Scrap an enemy Utility.

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character is defending against an enemy that has Pierce -> Reduce that enemy's Pierce total by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Motorcycle mode. You get an extra attack this turn, but only a Motorcycle can attack this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one -> Move an Upgrade from one of your characters to another one. OR Put a Battle Master Upgrade from your KO area onto one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is scrapped from a character -> Scrap an enemy Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Ranged characters only. While the upgraded character is defending against a Melee enemy -> The upgraded character has +1 [DEF].

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap a card from your hand. Then draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to a tapped enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you don't flip a [Bl] -> Scrap this card after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters is KO'd. When Revealed -> Instead of scrapping that character's Upgrades, you may put any number of them onto one of your other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from one of your characters. If your starting team was only Autobots -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play a Secret Action. Then you may play another Secret Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character battles and you flip your first [W] -> Flip 1 extra battle card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose on of your characters. When it does attack damage this turn to an enemy that has fewer [STAR] than it -> Do 1 damage to each enemy that has fewer [STAR] than your character.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Specialist only. While the upgraded character is defending against a Ranged enemy -> The upgraded character has +1 [DEF].

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If one or more of your characters would take non-attack damage during your opponent's turn. When Revealed -> Instead your characters can't take non-attack damage this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. If it's a Tank, your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and scraps them. If it's a Plane, your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 2 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip one of your Spaceships to bot mode. Then flip it back to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character battles -> Each player can't flip more than 2 battle cards during this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return an [O] Action from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you flip battle cards for this character's attack and before defense flips -> You may play one of the [B] Actions you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move any number of damage counters from one of your other characters to this, but not enough to KO her.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is KO'd -> Scrap the top card of your deck. You may play it. Then scrap another card from the top of your deck. You may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: This can't take non-attack damage from your opponent's cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and has a Weapon -> You may swap that Weapon with a [B] Weapon from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Do 1 damage to an enemy that has no Upgrades.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an Upgrade is scrapped from an enemy -> Do 1 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may reveal a Brainstorm from your deck and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play your third Action during your turn -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Do damage to an enemy equal to the number of Weapons you have on the battlefield.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, if this has 3 or more Upgrades -> Do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your other characters has Bold 1 and Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks an enemy that has a Weapon -> Do 2 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may look at the top card of your deck at any time. When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. Then your opponent chooses a cards from their hand and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may look at the top card of your deck at any time. While the top card of your deck is a Decepticon card or a Secret Action -> You may play it as though it were in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Spy Patrol has +1 [DEF]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Untap each of your Spy Patrols.

card.name: Major Ultra Magnus - Infantry, City Commander

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may put an Ultra Magnus Armor from your deck onto this. Brave.

alternate.name: Major Ultra Magnus - Infantry, City Commander

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [O][O][B][B] -> Do 1 damage to EACH character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this has a Weapon -> She has Bold 1 and Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Scrap any number of cards from your hand. For each one scrapped this way, the upgraded character gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [O] card from your hand -> You may play an Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 4. When the upgraded character attacks -> Plan 1. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into your KO area instead

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [Bl] card from your hand -> Move 1 damage counter from one of your characters to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [W][W] -> The defender's base [DEF] becomes 0 during this battle. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Repair 1 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W][O][B] -> This gets +3 [ATK] until the end of turn.

card.name: Private Red Heat - Infantry, Emergency Response

alternate.name: Private Red Heat - Infantry, Emergency Response

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [W] card from your hand -> Choose 2 of your characters and swap all their Upgrades.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> This gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn for each character in your KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your other characters is KO'd during your opponent's turn -> Untap this.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [W] card from your hand -> Flip one of your characters to its other mode.

card.name: Private Top Shot - Artillery, Patrol Leader

alternate.name: Private Top Shot - Artillery, Patrol Leader

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [O] card from your hand -> Draw 2 Cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [Bl] card from your hand -> Untap one of your characters that has 6 Stars or lower.

card.name: Private Trailbreaker - Infantry, Fortification and Defense

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may put a Force Field from your deck onto this.

alternate.name: Private Trailbreaker - Infantry, Fortification and Defense

property.name: Text
property.value: While this has an Armor -> He has Brave.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [B][B][B] -> Do 3 damage to the defender. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may play an [O] Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [O][O][O][O] -> Do 2 damage to a tapped enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [B] card from your hand -> Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each of your Firecons gets Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends and you flip battle cards -> He gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle for each [O] you flip, up to +5 [DEF].

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Return one of the defender's Upgrades to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. Then scrap a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 2. [Tap]: You may play a Secret Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return a card that has exactly 1 [Star] from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a battle card that has exactly 1 [STAR] -> Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [Bl][Bl] -> Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it in your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Do 1 damage to an enemy. If that enemy has 4 [DEF] or more, do 2 damage to it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap a [B] card from your hand -> One of your characters gets +3 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Repair 1 damage from this. If you have Runamuck on the battlefield, repair 1 damage from him, and flip him from bot mode to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. If you have Runabout on the battlefield, flip him from alt mode to bot mode.

card.name: Raider Storm Cloud - Infantry, Electronic Warfare

alternate.name: Raider Storm Cloud - Infantry, Electronic Warfare

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap 3 [G] cards from your hand -> One of your characters gets Bold 3 until end of turn. If the 3 scrapped cards have the same name, instead that character gets Bold 6 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return a Weapon from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Leader, Air Strike Patrol, Plane, Ranged

property.name: Text
property.value: [Tap]: Scrap 3 [G] cards from your hand -> Your opponent chooses 3 cards from their hand and scraps them. If the 3 cards you scrapped have the same name as each other, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may play an [B] armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends and you flip at least [B][B] -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Draw a card for each character you have on the battlefield. Then you may play an Upgrade onto each of your characters. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into your KO area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you upgrade this -> He gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an Upgrade is scrapped from one of your characters -> Repair 1 damage from this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return up to 2 Secret Actions that have different names from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Secret Action -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Scrap an enemy Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [O][O][O] -> Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Specialist Ratchet - Engineering, Rescue and Repair

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may reveal a Medic! from your deck and put it into your hand.

alternate.name: Specialist Ratchet - Engineering, Rescue and Repair

property.name: Text
property.value: When you repair damage -> This gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn for each damage repaired.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your starting [Star] limit increases by 1 for each Mini-Cassette on your starting team. This starts the game with all Mini-Cassettes on your starting team under it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Deploy a Mini-Cassette from under this to the battlefield in bot mode. When you do, play the top card of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may scrap them.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends -> Enemies can't use Bold this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> You may move an Armor from one of your characters to another one.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends -> You may play an [W] Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> Each of your characters gets Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1. Each of your characters that has 10 [Stars] or more has Bold 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your starting [Star] limit increases by 1 for each Mini-Cassette on your starting team. This starts the game with all Mini-Cassettes on your starting team under it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Deploy a Mini-Cassette from under this to the battlefield in bot mode. When you do, look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Your opponent puts that card on top of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> You may move a Weapon from one of your characters to another one.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> You may play a [B] Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent reveals the top 2 cards of their deck. You may have your opponent scrap those cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Enemies can't use Tough this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> One of your characters gets Pierce 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 2. Each of your characters that has 10 [Stars] or more has Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Buzzsaw on the battlefield -> Draw a card. If you have Ravage on the battlefield -> Do 1 damage to an enemy. If you have Frenzy on the battlefield -> Your opponent chooses one of thier Armors and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters -> It gets +1 [Atk] until end of turn for each Autobot Mini-Cassette in your KO area. If you have Blaster on the battlefield, the chosen character also gets Pierce 6 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if Soundwave was on your starting team. Draw 2 cards. Choose a card in your opponent's scrap pile and put it on top of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if Blaster was on your starting team. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Mini-Cassette you have on the battlefield -> The upgraded character has Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Blaster or Soundwave on the battlefield -> You may put one of your Mini-Cassettes from the battefield under it. If you do, repair 2 damage from one of your characters, then put this card into your KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your first turn -> You may play an Armor onto one of your Omnibots.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Omnibots with an Armor defends -> It gets Tough until end of battle equal to the number of Omnibots you have with an Armor.

card.name: Private Downshift - Special Ops, Security Agent

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your first turn -> You may play a Weapon onto one of your Omnibots.

alternate.name: Private Downshift - Special Ops, Security Agent

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Omnibots with a Weapon attacks -> It gets Bold until end of the turn equal to the number of Omnibots you have with a Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn -> You may play a Utility onto one of your Omnibots.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Omnibots with a Utility battles -> It gets Focus until end of battle equal to the number of Omnibots you have with a Utility.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip more colors of battle icons than your opponent flips -> The upgraded character gets +2 [Atk] until end of battle. If this would leave the battlefield -> Put it into your KO area instead.
